==== Ubuntu Women Team ====
* Team meeting <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20110112|January 12th]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://fullcirclemagazine.org/issue-45/|Full Circle Magazine, Issue #45]]</nowiki> with interview of Ubuntu Italy contributor Silvia Bindelli
* Received accessibility approval for Melissa Draper's new wiki/site theme
* Melissa Draper gives '' Our Sparkle Motion: Empowering the Geekocracy Against the Kyriarchy'' talk at LCA 2011 (<nowiki>[[http://linuxconfau.blip.tv/file/4697410/|video]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://geekosophical.net/misc/haecksen2011.odp|slides]]</nowiki>)
* Launched project to promote female participation in the <nowiki>[[http://uds.ubuntu.com|Ubuntu Developer Summit]]</nowiki>
** Created <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/UDS]]</nowiki>
** Created <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/UDS/Stories]]</nowiki>
* Of the 637 Ubuntu Members at the end of this month 5.02% are women (31 January 2011)
